title: The philosophy of meditation, transformative experience etc, w/ Rick Repetti - Voices with Vervaeke
description:
Rick Repetti is a full professor at Kingsborough Community Colledge, a certified philosophical counsellor, and the editor of the forthcoming Routedge Handbook of the Philosophy of Meditation.

Rick's  website, https://www.rickrepetti.com/, and the link to the forthcoming Routledge Handbook on the Philosophy of Meditation (London: Routledge, 2022), https://www.routledge.com/Routledge-Handbook-on-the-Philosophy-of-Meditation/Repetti/p/book/9780367647469#.
